com.google.api.client.auth.jsontoken

Class RsaSHA256Signer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.client.auth.jsontoken.RsaSHA256Signer

  • public class RsaSHA256Signer
extends java.lang.Object
    Signs a JSON Web Signature (JWS) using RSA and SHA-256.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    Yaniv Inbar

      • sign

        public static java.lang.String sign(java.security.PrivateKey privateKey,
                    JsonFactory jsonFactory,
                    JsonWebSignature.Header header,
                    JsonWebToken.Payload payload)
                             throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Signs a given JWS header and payload based on the given private key.

        Upgrade warning: this method now throws an IOException. In prior version 1.11 it did not throw IOException.

        Parameters:
        privateKey - private key
        jsonFactory - JSON factory
        header - JWS header
        payload - JWS payload
        Returns:
        signed JWS string
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        java.io.IOException
